creator: TaxBuddy.com
descriptionHtml:
File Zero Defect GST and Income Tax Returns with TaxBuddy.com

For Individuals - Salaried employees, Business persons & professionals.

For SMEs - GST Registration to Filing services along with other GST Compliances like responding to Notice.

We have several plans tailored for several combinations.

The most Affordable Income Tax Returns and GST Filing Plans in India.

Our Commitment:

CA (Chartered Accountant) Guided GST and Income Tax Return Filing.
'Guaranteed Tax Saving' Through Tax Planning Advisory.
Complete And Expert Solutions To I-T and GST Notices.
End To End Tax Advisory Services.

Our Services
We provide end-to-end solutions to tax matters right from filing accurate ITR's to compliance to tax notices & scrutiny assessment.
A) GST (Charges Starting from Rs. 299)
> Registration of GST
> Tax Expert Assistance for GST Return Filing
> GST Compliance & Advisory

B) Income Tax Filing (Charges Starting from Rs. 499)
> Filing Income Tax Returns for all Constitution
> CA Assisted Filing
> Complimentary service of Customised Tax planning and Notice Management

C) Tax Notices
> Got a Tax Notice?
> Just Relax & Upload The Notice
> We would assist you to prepare & file response to I-T Dept

D) Tax Planning
> Artificial Intelligence-based Tax Planning Application
> Guaranteed Tax Saving
> Intuitive and Simple interface

E) Other Tax Compliances
> TDS, TCS, ROC, etc Filing
> Business Set-ups
> Statutory compliances
> Accounting and Reporting

Our Core Strengths
TaxBuddy’s intuitive e-filling application ensures filling ‘Accurate’ tax returns. TaxBuddy leverages technology to bring expert advice to taxpayers at a reasonable cost. Post ITR filing, TaxBuddy offers free tax advisory for a year and notices management for lifetime**

Get Live Tax Expert Advice
We've got your back! As you need our help, an expert from the panel of tax professionals will contact you!

100% Accuracy Guaranteed
This is our prime objective since inaccurate ITR's and compliance to notices come with undesirable consequences for taxpayers.

Secure Data
The information of the taxpayer belongs ONLY to him and we ensure that through military-grade security. No one except him can access it.
descriptionShort: Tax Compliance Service done by CA for maximum savings with peace of mind service

TaxBuddy helps file taxes for all individuals - salaried employees, business persons & professionals. It also serves SMEs, from GST registration, and filing services to other GST compliances like responding to notices.

Services:

GST Filing
1) GST Registration
2) Tax Assistance for GST Return Filing
3) GST Compliance & Advisory

Income Tax Filing
1) Filing Income Tax Returns
2) CA Assisted Filing
3) Tax planning, Notice Compliance, and Accidental Insurance

Tax Notices and Assistance with
1) Uploading Tax Notices
2) Preparing & filing responses to the IT department

Tax Planning
1) Tax report of your investments
2) Expert Advice for Tax Saving
3) Simple interface

Other Tax Compliances
1) TDS, TCS, ROC, etc Filing
2) Business Set-ups
3) Statutory compliances
4) Accounting and Reporting

Source & Disclaimer: We’ve sourced the information from incometaxindia.gov.in. TaxBuddy does NOT represent any government entity. It is NOT affiliated with the Income Tax Department of the Government of India.
descriptionShort: India's Most Trusted Tax Filing Platform. Easy & secure Tax Filing Platform

creator: TaxBuddy.com
descriptionHtml:
TaxBuddy is a comprehensive platform designed to simplify tax filing, compliance, and investment management for individuals and businesses. Whether you’re a salaried employee, business owner, or professional, TaxBuddy has you covered.

Beyond taxes, our Portfolio Doctor feature empowers users to analyze and optimize their investments, providing tailored insights to achieve financial success. With expert support and advanced tools, TaxBuddy ensures you stay ahead in your financial journey.

Core Features and Services

Income Tax Filing

• Expert-assisted filing for accurate and stress-free submissions.
• 24/7 post-filing support for peace of mind.
• Free resolution of IT notices for returns filed through TaxBuddy.

Portfolio Doctor

• Analyze your investment portfolio in minutes with advanced insights.
• Import your mutual funds and download a customized, actionable report.

Wealth Builder

• Personalized investment advisory tailored to your financial goals.
• Expert recommendations based on past investments and future plans.

No-Commission Mutual Funds

• Review historical fund performance and analyze risk levels.
• Get estimated future returns and make informed decisions.
• Choose funds confidently with our advanced rating system.

Tax Notices Assistance

• Effortlessly upload and track your tax notices.
• Expert support for preparing and filing responses with the Income Tax Department.

GST Registration and Filing

• Hassle-free GST registration for businesses.
• Tax assistance for timely GST return filings.
• Comprehensive GST compliance and advisory services.

Tax Planning

• Detailed tax reports of your investments for better planning.
• Expert advice to maximize your tax savings.
• Simple, user-friendly interface for seamless planning.

Other Tax and Business Compliances

• Support for TDS, TCS, ROC filings, and more.
• Assistance with business setups, including legal and statutory compliances.
• Accounting and reporting services for SMEs.

TaxBuddy combines expert assistance with advanced tools to deliver unmatched ease in tax filing, investment management, and compliance. Simplify your financial journey with us today!

Source & Disclaimer: We’ve sourced the information from incometaxindia.gov.in. TaxBuddy does NOT represent any government entity. It is NOT affiliated with the Income Tax Department of the Government of India.
descriptionShort: Your One-Stop Solution for Taxes, Investments, and Compliance
